quotes.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is a journey, and if you fall in love with the journey, you will be in love forever.
quotes.author: Peter Hagerty

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs
